title: rpgitem插件怎么才能把一个武器设置成无限耐久

replies.author: q1551568826
replies.txt_content:
默认就是无限耐久
指令/rpgitem [物品] durability infinite
设置耐久
/rpgitem [物品] durability Durability[整数值]

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
默认就是无限耐久
指令/rpgitem [物品] durability infinite
设置耐久
/rpgitem [物品] durability Durability[整数值]
